Mine was 1 game, not 2 or 3, but 1 game. I didn't even get chat restrictions, the system automatically temp banned me because it signaled 4 reports in one game, if not 5 because the other team was trolling as well.

The system doesn't automatically ban people based upon number of reports. 

You were taunting, insulting, and retaliating ... generally not being a very pleasant teammate to be stuck with.

Remember, previous punishments are taken into account with the escalation system. If you fail to show reform after being warned and punished, you will be punished more harshly.

And yet, you idiots at riot haven't punished anyone that made him that way. I'm getting sick and tired of having to deal with these exploiters, intentional feeders, and toxic players while you morons turn a blind eye.

You do realize that calling them idiots and morons isn't really helping your case, right?

And considering that the one you're accusing of turning a blind eye to toxic players is, well, explaining how the system works to a toxic player and commenting on their behavior, well it's not really helping your case either. 

And just because other people are toxic doesn't excuse anyone's toxic behavior. The only one responsible for your behavior is YOU, so the whole "you haven't punished anyone that made him that way" is not only a flawed claim, but even if it was true (the punishing part!) it still wouldn't hold water. Nobody makes anyone do anything in this game, merely influence and nothing more.

I also just had a premade who wouldn't let me play... they would spam ping fall back every time I went into any lane (top, mid, or bot) when we already had a jungler. They would purposely let the other team kill me then told everyone to report me for feeding at the end.
